property.name: text
property.value: Move the sensor node (MicaBoard) towards/away from the PhotoSource. When the PhotoSource is out of range, the LEDs do not change.

property.name: text
property.value: Running this demo executes a "make" command. To see the make command, look inside the Mica Board, then look inside the MicaCompositeActor, then select Debug -> Listen to Director
